Super Action Soccer

by Team Pixelboy

Released Jan 1, 2012
Players 1
License Unknown

Download ROM

Description

The world's most popular sport finally comes to America! Super Action Soccer gives you the chance to be the most accomplished star player of any team that ever was. You will be involved all the time in the most exciting moments of the game. You will score the winning goal!
